post_text: August 28, 2023 at 8:12â€¯AM#1I have the following problem :washer an spot are actually running with a circle p/t and a color fx (rainbow)now i want them all to strobe in white..I made a sequence ( all @100, color=white, Dimmer PWM -FX) and assign this to an direct action button as a flash ..So when inow  flash the sequence, everything works and strobes in white, when i release the button,all the fixtures remain in white color and the rainbow-fx (was running before i flash the sequence ) was killed but  the move FX was still running...i also check the sequence options...were is my fault ?
title: Strobe-Sequences kills running color FX after flashing the sequence
